Text: Women for Golden Hill (German: Frauen für Golden Hill) is a 1938 German drama film directed by Erich Waschneck and starring Kirsten Heiberg, Viktor Staal and Elfie Mayerhofer.

Text: Women for Golden Hill:  The all-male inhabitants of an Australian mining camp send off for some mail order brides from Sydney.
